ticTacToe.name: Tic Tac Toe
ticTacToe.description: Classic strategy game for two players. First to get three in a row wins!

game2048.description: Slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach the 2048 tile.

flappyBird.name: Flappy Bird
flappyBird.description: Navigate through pipes by tapping to keep the bird flying.

snake.name: Snake
snake.description: Control a growing snake to eat food while avoiding walls and yourself.

memoryGame.name: Memory Game
memoryGame.description: Test your memory by matching pairs of hidden cards.

brickBreaker.name: Brick Breaker
brickBreaker.description: Destroy bricks with a ball and paddle. Break all bricks to clear the level!
